post.title: I Finally Have a Phone
post.content: It’s not my final phone. It’s a loaner since my wireless provider couldn’t seem to process the order for my replacement phone due to “server issues”. I have to return this one next week when my “real” phone arrives. But, hey, at least I can make a phone call from my car in the meantime.
